messages.title: Peter Black: a record of action, a promise of more
messages.content: Welcoming you to personally meet and discuss any concerns you may have.

issues.health: NHS waiting lists are at a record high.

housing.content: Too many people have been let down over housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: I believe that politics is about serving the public, not oneself.

politicalExperience.achievements: Saved three schools from closure, established a local investment fund, worked towards free swimming for children and pensioners.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Peter Black has been standing up for the area for 17 years as your Assembly Member.
